name: Saas-project-app
body:
== README

This is the final in a series of projects I did to show proficiency with Ruby on Rails. It's an app where users can sign up, invite members and collaborate on projects together. 


View it in production on Heroku:
[SaaS Project](https://ruby-saas-app.herokuapp.com/)

![rubies](http://www.devinterface.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/Ruby-on-Rails-slider.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
